name.value: Able to access the system at all levels/stores

name.value: Assemble all needed materials for immunization session

description.value: *Business process* (B) plan service delivery: Activity: Assemble all needed materials for immunization session: As a Health worker, I want to: >The system to provide a immunization session materials checklist, which is a list of materials I would need for immunization session so that >I can make sure I have the materials I need for immunization session

name.value: Automatically log out the user after a specified time of inactivity

description.value: *Category*: Confidentiality, privacy and security Automatically log out the user after a specified time of inactivity

description.value: *Category*: Scalability Be able to accommodate at least [x number of] concurrent users

description.value: *Category*: Reliability Be deployed in an environment subject to power loss

name.value: Be reliable and robust (minimize the number of system crashes)

description.value: *Category*: Usability Be reliable and robust (minimize the number of system crashes)

name.value: Be user-friendly for people with low computer literacy

description.value: *Category*: Usability Be user-friendly for people with low computer literacy

name.value: Be well-documented, including known issues

name.value: Capture or update client history

description.value: *Business process* (D) administer vaccine: Activity: Capture or update client history: As a Health worker, I want to: >The system to provide a history of previous care (including previous vaccination records) so that >I have access and review client's history

name.value: Capture or update client history

description.value: *Business process* (D) administer vaccine: Activity: Capture or update client history: As a Health worker, I want to: >To add client's health history (including previous vaccination records) so that >I can appropriately determine which vaccinations are required

name.value: Check stock availability of recommended vaccines

description.value: *Business process* (D) administer vaccine: Activity: Check stock availability of recommended vaccines: As a Health worker, I want to: >The system to display stock availability of recommended vaccines so that >I can check if the vaccines are available

name.value: Check stock availability of recommended vaccines

description.value: *Business process* (D) administer vaccine: Activity: Check stock availability of recommended vaccines: As a Health worker, I want to: >The system to warn if required vaccine is not in stock so that >I can alert the client if the vaccine is not available

name.value: Check stock availability of recommended vaccines

description.value: *Business process* (D) administer vaccine: Activity: Check stock availability of recommended vaccines: As a Health worker, I want to: >The system to display the expiry date of stock to ensure expired vaccines are not administered so that >I give safe and effective doses only

name.value: Community health worker

description.value: Actor Community health worker from Function Requirements

name.value: Comply with country's existing health information storage policies

description.value: *Category*: Confidentiality, privacy and security Comply with country's existing health information storage policies

name.value: Comply with industry standards for data exchange

description.value: *Category*: Compatibility Comply with industry standards for data exchange

name.value: Comply with industry standards for tracking and tracing of supplies

description.value: *Category*: Compatibility Comply with industry standards for tracking and tracing of supplies

name.value: Configure business rules in line with guidelines and standard operating procedures

description.value: *Category*: Configuration Configure business rules in line with guidelines and standard operating procedures

name.value: Configure error messages

description.value: *Category*: Configuration Configure error messages

name.value: Configure the system centrally

description.value: *Category*: Configuration Configure the system centrally

name.value: Create client record

description.value: *Business process* (C) client registration: Activity: Create client record: As a Health worker, I want to: >The system to enforce a minimal required data set for new registrations so that >Sufficient data is entered to be able to identify the client

name.value: Create client record

description.value: *Business process* (C) client registration: Activity: Create client record: As a Health worker, I want to: >The system to uniquely identify every client using a system generated unique identifier or an existing identifier (e.g. health care, national ID, health unique ID) so that >The client can be definitively identified using that number

name.value: Create client record

description.value: *Business process* (C) client registration: Activity: Create client record: As a Health worker, I want to: >The system to generate a unique identifier so that >The client can be uniquely identified for vaccination activities across systems using the same ID

name.value: Create client record

description.value: *Business process* (C) client registration: Activity: Create client record: As a Health worker, I want to: >Validate a unique identifier when system is offline so that >Entry errors are prevented

name.value: Create/update vaccination location record

description.value: *Business process* (A) vaccination location registration: Activity: Create/update vaccination location record: As a EIR staff, I want to: >The system to be able to update vaccination location information so that >We have a complete vaccination location record

name.value: Define parameters for report

description.value: *Business process* (I) report generation: Activity: Define parameters for report: As a Health worker, I want to: >To be able to configure report parameters when creating new reports (period of time, inactive versus active clients, client's age, vaccine type, vaccine manufacturer, etc.) so that >Appropriate reports can be generated

name.value: Define parameters for report

description.value: *Business process* (I) report generation: Activity: Define parameters for report: As a Health worker, I want to: >To be able to select report parameters when creating vaccination coverage reports (i.e. by vaccine, by dose, by age, by area, by condition, by vaccine manufacturer, etc) so that >Appropriate vaccination coverage reports can be generated

name.value: Define parameters for report

description.value: *Business process* (I) report generation: Activity: Define parameters for report: As a Health worker, I want to: >To be able to customize report parameters for error monitoring reports so that >I can generate reports specific to my needs and the nature of potential programmatic errors I want to monitor

name.value: Define parameters for report

description.value: *Business process* (I) report generation: Activity: Define parameters for report: As a Health worker, I want to: >To be able to select what information a report shows (i.e. display options, summary versus detail report, sort options) so that >The report presentation can be customised

name.value: Define parameters for report

description.value: *Business process* (I) report generation: Activity: Define parameters for report: As a Health worker, I want to: >To be able to schedule routine reports (specific date/time, daily, weekly, etc.) so that >The reports can be generated automatically and are available at the right time

name.value: Define/evaluate criteria

description.value: *Business process* (E) client reminder: Activity: Define/evaluate criteria: As a Health worker, I want to: >To select reminder parameters. May include but not limited to, age range, vaccine type(s), vaccine schedules, geographic area, number of days overdue, number of reminders, etc. so that >Reminders can be optimized

name.value: Define/evaluate criteria

description.value: *Business process* (E) client reminder: Activity: Define/evaluate criteria: As a Health worker, I want to: >To associate a client with a vaccination location to generate a provider-based reminder/recall so that >Vaccination location specific lists of clients can be generated

name.value: Define/evaluate criteria

description.value: *Business process* (E) client reminder: Activity: Define/evaluate criteria: As a Health worker, I want to: >To validate data against the vaccine schedule (Note: Can use the vaccine schedule to best schedule reminders/recall for series vaccinations) so that >The generated list adheres to guidelines

name.value: Design software security protections to ensure system availability

description.value: *Category*: Confidentiality, privacy and security Design software security protections to ensure system availability

name.value: Determine if vaccines were missed

description.value: *Business process* (F) defaulter tracing: Activity: Determine if vaccines were missed: As a Health worker, I want to: >The system to flag a client as a defaulter after a configured number of reminders are sent so that >We can identify those who have not come and are overdue, requiring additional intervention

name.value: Determine if vaccines were missed

description.value: *Business process* (F) defaulter tracing: Activity: Determine if vaccines were missed: As a Health worker, I want to: >To specify thresholds for a client to qualify as requiring follow-up, based on the national immunization guidelines so that >Follow up is only done at the appropriate time

name.value: Determine required vaccination(s)

description.value: *Business process* (D) administer vaccine: Activity: Determine required vaccination(s): As a Health worker, I want to: >The system to display vaccines due according to predefined vaccine protocol so that >I can assess which vaccines need to be administered

name.value: Determine required vaccination(s)

description.value: *Business process* (D) administer vaccine: Activity: Determine required vaccination(s): As a Health worker, I want to: >The system to determine vaccines due for a given client by considering relevant information, such as the age of the client, vaccine products, vaccines already given and predefined vaccine protocol so that >it helps me with selecting the appropriate vaccines for the client

name.value: Determine required vaccination(s)

description.value: *Business process* (D) administer vaccine: Activity: Determine required vaccination(s): As a Health worker, I want to: >The system to ensure I have the most up-to-date vaccine protocols so that >It will recommend the correct schedule

name.value: Determine time for next visit (as needed)

description.value: *Business process* (D) administer vaccine: Activity: Determine time for next visit (as needed): As a Health worker, I want to: >The system to display due date of the next vaccine so that >I can inform the client when to return for their next vaccination

name.value: Determine vaccine(s) to be administered based on contraindications

description.value: *Business process* (D) administer vaccine: Activity: Determine vaccine(s) to be administered based on contraindications: As a Health worker, I want to: >To be alerted of any relevant potential contraindications for the vaccine (e.g. based on age, previous allergic reactions, etc.) so that >I can withhold the vaccine, if contraindicated

name.value: Determine vaccine(s) to be administered based on contraindications

description.value: *Business process* (D) administer vaccine: Activity: Determine vaccine(s) to be administered based on contraindications: As a Health worker, I want to: >To be able to quickly access information regarding any contraindications by antigen so that >I can access all information on contraindications in one place

name.value: Dispose of waste

description.value: *Business process* (D) administer vaccine: Activity: Dispose of waste: As a Health worker, I want to: >To update stock record so that >I know which stock adjustments have not been done automatically (such as in instances if something is wasted)

name.value: Does client require a verifiable digital certificate?

description.value: *Business process* (D) administer vaccine: Activity: Does client require a verifiable digital certificate?: As a Health worker, I want to: >To be prompted to ask client if they want a digital vaccination certificate where appropriate so that >The digital vaccination certificate can be generated

description.value: *Category*: Reliability Enable users to work offline and then synchronize data when data connection is available

name.value: Evaluate vaccine event records

description.value: *Business process* (H) resolve duplicate vaccination events: Activity: Evaluate vaccine event records: As a EIR staff OR health worker, I want to: >To be able to manually initiate duplicates identification process so that >It can be done when the user is available to review

name.value: Evaluate vaccine event records

description.value: *Business process* (H) resolve duplicate vaccination events: Activity: Evaluate vaccine event records: As a EIR staff OR health worker, I want to: >To be able to manually flag duplicate vaccination events so that >I can report duplicates that the system was not able to identify

name.value: Evaluate vaccine event records

description.value: *Business process* (H) resolve duplicate vaccination events: Activity: Evaluate vaccine event records: As a EIR staff OR health worker, I want to: >The system to display a specific set of data related to the possible duplicated events (such as vaccine type, manufacturer, administration date, etc.) for manual review so that >I am able to perform the review

name.value: Evaluate vaccine event records

description.value: *Business process* (H) resolve duplicate vaccination events: Activity: Evaluate vaccine event records: As a EIR staff OR health worker, I want to: >To be able to view simultaneously potential duplicate records so that >I can easily compare the records and to determine if they are duplicates

name.value: Evaluate vaccine event records

description.value: *Business process* (H) resolve duplicate vaccination events: Activity: Evaluate vaccine event records: As a EIR staff OR health worker, I want to: >To be able to access the vaccination events while reviewing the duplicates so that >I can review other fields to aid in my decision-making

name.value: Exchange actionable data between systems (need to enforce semantic interoperability)

description.value: *Category*: Compatibility Exchange actionable data between systems (need to enforce semantic interoperability)

name.value: Flag client records for evaluation

description.value: *Business process* (G) resolve duplicate client records: Activity: Flag client records for evaluation: As a EIR staff, I want to: >The system to support a rules-based algorithm to evaluate duplicate records so that >Duplicates can be found by the system using pre-defined rules

name.value: Flag client records for evaluation

description.value: *Business process* (G) resolve duplicate client records: Activity: Flag client records for evaluation: As a EIR staff, I want to: >To be able to modify the business rules used for identifying duplicate client records so that >The de-duplication process is optimized

name.value: Flag client records for evaluation

description.value: *Business process* (G) resolve duplicate client records: Activity: Flag client records for evaluation: As a EIR staff, I want to: >The system to automatically flag client records as possible duplicates by marking them as pending for review so that >The health worker or EIR staff is informed and aware of pending review

name.value: Focus on the mobile-user experience with secondary use of a computer

description.value: *Category*: Usability Focus on the mobile-user experience with secondary use of a computer

name.value: Generate analysis of the use of different system features and reports

description.value: *Category*: Confidentiality, privacy and security Generate analysis of the use of different system features and reports

name.value: Generate IDs that are unique across different locations or sites

description.value: *Category*: General Generate IDs that are unique across different locations or sites

name.value: Generate list of clients

description.value: *Business process* (E) client reminder: Activity: Generate list of clients: As a Health worker, I want to: >The system to track the number of reminders attempts (i.e. per client and total) so that >I can know if additional action may be required, or when to stop sending reminders

name.value: Generate list of clients

description.value: *Business process* (E) client reminder: Activity: Generate list of clients: As a Health worker, I want to: >The system to prevent all records given an inactive or deceased status from being included in the list of clients for reminder/recall so that >Notifications will not be inappropriately sent to clients

name.value: Generate list of clients

description.value: *Business process* (E) client reminder: Activity: Generate list of clients: As a Health worker, I want to: >to be able to generate a list of clients according to defined parameters so that >I have a list according to my needs

name.value: Generate list of clients

description.value: *Business process* (E) client reminder: Activity: Generate list of clients: As a Health worker, I want to: >To print the list of clients generated according to defined parameters so that >I can use it when I am offline

name.value: Generate list of clients

description.value: *Business process* (E) client reminder: Activity: Generate list of clients: As a Health worker, I want to: >The system to log each time a user prints a list of clients so that >Printing needs can be monitored

name.value: Generate list of clients

description.value: *Business process* (E) client reminder: Activity: Generate list of clients: As a Health worker, I want to: >The system to display the date the reminder/recall notice was sent to a client so that >I will know when it was sent and can follow-up accordingly

name.value: Generate list of clients who are due or overdue for vaccination

description.value: *Business process* (F) defaulter tracing: Activity: Generate list of clients who are due or overdue for vaccination: As a Health worker, I want to: >To produce a list of clients who missed their vaccine for each antigen, along with their location and personal information so that >I can plan follow up activities and contact the clients

name.value: Generate list of clients who are due or overdue for vaccination

description.value: *Business process* (F) defaulter tracing: Activity: Generate list of clients who are due or overdue for vaccination: As a Health worker, I want to: >To print a list of clients requiring follow-up so that >I will have an offline version

name.value: Generate list of clients who are due or overdue for vaccination

description.value: *Business process* (F) defaulter tracing: Activity: Generate list of clients who are due or overdue for vaccination: As a Health worker, I want to: >To export a list of clients for follow-up so that >Information can be sent to another health worker or system as appropriate

name.value: Generate report

description.value: *Business process* (I) report generation: Activity: Generate report: As a EIR staff, I want to: >The system to produce and export reports in multiple formats (i.e. CSV, PDF) on demand so that >I can select the most appropriate format for my needs

name.value: Generate report

description.value: *Business process* (I) report generation: Activity: Generate report: As a EIR staff, I want to: >The system to be able to print reports on demand so that >I can have a paper version of the report

name.value: Generate report

description.value: *Business process* (I) report generation: Activity: Generate report: As a EIR staff, I want to: >The system to show me a preview of the report before printing so that >I can review before printing

name.value: Generate report

description.value: *Business process* (I) report generation: Activity: Generate report: As a EIR staff, I want to: >The system to log the actions performed on the reports so that >An audit can be performed when needed

name.value: Generate report

description.value: *Business process* (I) report generation: Activity: Generate report: As a Health worker, I want to: >The system to offer the posibility of sending the generated report by email so that >I do not have to manually do that

name.value: Generate report of duplicate vaccine events

description.value: *Business process* (H) resolve duplicate vaccination events: Activity: Generate report of duplicate vaccine events: As a EIR staff, I want to: >The system to be able to generate a report of duplicate vaccine events including the resolutions so that >I can have a summary of the changes made

name.value: Generate unique location identifier

description.value: *Business process* (A) vaccination location registration: Activity: Generate unique location identifier: As a EIR staff, I want to: >The system to generate a unique EIR identifier which may be linked to national ID or health ID so that >The vaccination location will have an unique identifier in the EIR system

name.value: Generate verifiable digital certificate

description.value: *Business process* (D) administer vaccine: Activity: Generate verifiable digital certificate: As a Health worker, I want to: >The system to apply an authorised digital signature when necessary and appropriate so that >The identity of the issuing authority can be validated

name.value: Get needed stock

description.value: *Business process* (B) plan service delivery: Activity: Get needed stock: As a Health worker, I want to: >The system to allow me to print the stock order(s) to be fulfilled so that >I can use this as my pick up list, even when I am offline

name.value: Have a source code audit against security threats

description.value: *Category*: Confidentiality, privacy and security Have a source code audit against security threats

name.value: Have a support process that tracks and documents bugs from discovery to resolution

description.value: *Category*: Maintainability Have a support process that tracks and documents bugs from discovery to resolution

name.value: Have adequate support resources to ensure reusability, scalability and sustainability

description.value: *Category*: Maintainability Have adequate support resources to ensure reusability, scalability and sustainability

name.value: Have the ability to easily back up information

description.value: *Category*: General Have the ability to easily back up information

name.value: Health worker

description.value: Actor Health worker from Function Requirements

name.value: Identify groups of vaccination events for evaluation

description.value: *Business process* (H) resolve duplicate vaccination events: Activity: Identify groups of vaccination events for evaluation: As a EIR staff, I want to: >The system to support a rules-based algorithm to evaluate duplicate events so that >Duplicates can be found by the system using pre-defined rules

name.value: Identify groups of vaccination events for evaluation

description.value: *Business process* (H) resolve duplicate vaccination events: Activity: Identify groups of vaccination events for evaluation: As a EIR staff, I want to: >The system to automatically flag event records as possible duplicates by marking them as pending for review so that >The health worker or EIR staff is informed and aware of pending review

name.value: Identify groups of vaccination events for evaluation

description.value: *Business process* (H) resolve duplicate vaccination events: Activity: Identify groups of vaccination events for evaluation: As a EIR staff, I want to: >to be able to modify the business rules used for identifying vaccination events duplicates so that >The de-duplication process can be optimized

name.value: Identify groups of vaccination events for evaluation

description.value: *Business process* (H) resolve duplicate vaccination events: Activity: Identify groups of vaccination events for evaluation: As a EIR staff, I want to: >The system to prompt the user that a new vaccination event might already exist so that >The user can decide if it is a duplicate and if so not save it

name.value: Identify groups of vaccination events for evaluation

description.value: *Business process* (H) resolve duplicate vaccination events: Activity: Identify groups of vaccination events for evaluation: As a EIR staff, I want to: >The system to generate automatically a list of possible duplicated vaccination events so that >The review process is optimized

name.value: Include an administrable content management system

description.value: *Category*: Maintainability Include an administrable content management system

name.value: Link with insurance systems to verify eligibility and submit claims

description.value: *Category*: Interoperability Link with insurance systems to verify eligibility and submit claims

*Business process* (A) vaccination location registration: Activity: Obtain vaccination location information: As a Electronic immunization registry (EIR) staff, I want to: >The EIR system to be able to communicate with other systems (such as a national health management information system [HMIS] and Expanded Programme on Immunization [EPI]) to obtain vaccination locations information and other necessary information so that >I will know about new vaccination locations and be informed about any updated information

*Business process* (A) vaccination location registration: Activity: Validate against national master facility list: As a EIR staff, I want to: >The system to interface with National Master Facility List (NMFL) database to validate the EIR master list of vaccination locations so that >I can ensure the lists are synchronized

*Business process* (A) vaccination location registration: Activity: Validate against national master facility list: As a EIR staff, I want to: >The system to flag any vaccination location registered in the EIR that is not on the NMFL so that >I can identify vaccination locations that need further investigation

*Business process* (A) vaccination location registration: Activity: Validate against national master facility list: As a EIR staff, I want to: >The system to be able to link a vaccination location’s NMFL identification (ID) with the corresponding EIR identifier so that >There will be a common understanding of what vaccination location is being referenced

*Business process* (A) vaccination location registration: Activity: Update/add new vaccination location: As a EIR staff, I want to: >The system to allow manual insertion of a new vaccination location not present in the NMFL in the EIR master list so that >I can add and use vaccination locations that are not yet in NMFL or other interconnected systems

*Business process* (A) vaccination location registration: Activity: Update/add new vaccination location: As a EIR staff, I want to: >The system to send a notification to the NMFL about a new vaccination location added to EIR so that >The NMFL can be aware of any potentially new vaccination locations

*Business process* (A) vaccination location registration: Activity: Update/add new vaccination location: As a EIR staff, I want to: >To be able to include vaccination locations that may not be physical permanent facilities (such as temporary or pop-up clinics) so that >We will have the flexibility to accommodate temporary vaccination locations

*Business process* (A) vaccination location registration: Activity: Create/update vaccination location record: As a EIR staff, I want to: >The system to be able to update vaccination location information so that >We have a complete vaccination location record

*Business process* (A) vaccination location registration: Activity: Update/add new vaccination location: As a EIR staff, I want to: >The system to allow conversion of a temporary vaccination location to a permanent vaccination location so that >The data from the temporary vaccination location is not lost

*Business process* (A) vaccination location registration: Activity: Verify information for additional data: As a EIR staff, I want to: >The system to automatically identify changes in vaccination locations information, retrieved from other interconnected systems, and prompt for validation so that >I will know what changes are being made and can validate them

*Business process* (A) vaccination location registration: Activity: Verify information for additional data: As a EIR staff, I want to: >The system to verify all required vaccination location information is complete so that >Any missed fields can be identified

*Business process* (A) vaccination location registration: Activity: Verify information for additional data: As a EIR staff, I want to: >The system to generate report of missing information so that >Missing information can be obtained

*Business process* (A) vaccination location registration: Activity: Request additional information: As a EIR staff, I want to: >The system to notify me of incomplete mandatory fields so that >I can ensure all necessary data is entered

*Business process* (A) vaccination location registration: Activity: Request additional information: As a EIR staff, I want to: >The system to support the process of sending a request for information so that >I will not have to transcribe the request and send it manually

*Business process* (A) vaccination location registration: Activity: Generate unique location identifier: As a EIR staff, I want to: >The system to generate a unique EIR identifier which may be linked to national ID or health ID so that >The vaccination location will have an unique identifier in the EIR system

*Business process* (A) vaccination location registration: Activity: Send vaccination location registration notification: As a EIR staff, I want to: >The system to send EIR registration notification with EIR identifer to other systems so that >Other systems will be informed of the new vaccination location

*Business process* (A) vaccination location registration: Activity: Send vaccination location registration notification: As a EIR staff, I want to: >The system to include instructions on how to use EIR identifier so that >Other systems will know how to interact with the EIR

*Business process* (B) plan service delivery: Activity: Review past vaccination records to estimate vaccines needed: As a Health worker, I want to: >To identify, by checking the information in the system, all clients that are due (or overdue) for vaccination by the next immunization session date so that >I can plan my immunization session

*Business process* (B) plan service delivery: Activity: Review past vaccination records to estimate vaccines needed: As a Health worker, I want to: >To sort the list of needed vaccines by antigen so that >I know how much of each vaccine is needed

*Business process* (B) plan service delivery: Activity: Review past vaccination records to estimate vaccines needed: As a Health worker, I want to: >The system to provide range estimates for needed vaccines based on historical data (high and low ranges) so that >I can know how much vaccine has typically been used and adjust my specific list accordingly

*Business process* (B) plan service delivery: Activity: Record details on planning sheet: As a Health worker, I want to: >To print the list of necessary antigens and accessories (e.g. syringes, wipes) based on projected need so that >I can make sure I have an offline list of all the things I need for my immunization session

*Business process* (B) plan service delivery: Activity: Record details on planning sheet: As a Health worker, I want to: >To be able to check in the system the available stock at my vaccination location or at the local storage area/warehouse so that >I can determine the stock available for use

*Business process* (B) plan service delivery: Activity: Record details on planning sheet: As a Health worker, I want to: >The system to compare the list of needed antigens to the stock on hand and indicate if there is sufficient stock so that >I do not have to make these calculations myself

*Business process* (B) plan service delivery: Activity: Get needed stock: As a Health worker, I want to: >The system to allow me to print the stock order(s) to be fulfilled so that >I can use this as my pick up list, even when I am offline

*Business process* (B) plan service delivery: Activity: Record stock taken: As a Health worker, I want to: >The system to allow barcode reading of stock taken so that >the system can be automatically and accurately updated

*Business process* (B) plan service delivery: Activity: Record stock taken: As a Health worker, I want to: >To record stock removed from cold storage and taken to immunization session so that >The count for the cold storage will be accurate, and the immunization session stock will be accounted for

*Business process* (B) plan service delivery: Activity: Record stock taken: As a Health worker, I want to: >The system to maintain a tally of stock available at each location (e.g. stock available in the cold fridge at vaccination location, stock that is out for immunization session) so that >I can see where all stock is physically located in real time

*Business process* (B) plan service delivery: Activity: Assemble all needed materials for immunization session: As a Health worker, I want to: >The system to provide a immunization session materials checklist, which is a list of materials I would need for immunization session so that >I can make sure I have the materials I need for immunization session

*Business process* (C) client registration: Activity: Query client record: As a Health worker, I want to: >To search for a client using at least two identifying information so that >I improve my chances of finding a match and distinguishing between similar records

*Business process* (C) client registration: Activity: Query client record: As a Health worker, I want to: >To search for the client record given some demographic information so that >I can find the client record if I do not have the unique ID

*Business process* (C) client registration: Activity: Query client record: As a Health worker, I want to: >The system to return all potential matches based upon search criteria so that >I can find the best match

*Business process* (C) client registration: Activity: Query client record: As a Health worker, I want to: >The search to match on partial information (such as partial birthdates) so that >I have a better chance of finding a match

*Business process* (C) client registration: Activity: Query client record: As a Health worker, I want to: >The system to allow search parameters configuration: mandatory fields, when partial information is acceptable, etc. so that >A search can be optimized without compromising confidentiality

*Business process* (C) client registration: Activity: Query client record: As a Health worker, I want to: >To search with wild cards (using a symbol to replace one or more characters) so that >I can find something without knowing the exact spelling

*Business process* (C) client registration: Activity: Query client record: As a Health worker, I want to: >To find client records using barcodes that contain the client ID so that >I can quickly pull up the correct record

*Business process* (C) client registration: Activity: Query client record: As a Health worker, I want to: >The ability for searches to include results that look or sound similar to the search term (phonetic search) so that >I can find something that may be spelt incorrectly

*Business process* (C) client registration: Activity: Query client record: As a Health worker, I want to: >the system to identify any records that may have been imported from another system so that >I can verify the quality of imported data

*Business process* (C) client registration: Activity: Query client record: As a Health worker, I want to: >The system to prompt a search for the client (check if it is already in the system) prior to starting a new record so that >Duplicates are prevented

*Business process* (C) client registration: Activity: Query client record: As a Health worker, I want to: >The system to retrieve and display, as a search result, a specific set of data (demographic information/photo/unique ID, etc. ) so that >I can select the correct record

*Business process* (C) client registration: Activity: Query client record: As a Health worker, I want to: >The system to display the most probable matches at the top of the list so that >I can review them first

*Business process* (C) client registration: Activity: Query client record: As a Health worker, I want to: >To be able to extend the search to external systems (such as a birth registry or a scheduling system) so that >Duplicates of client record are prevented

*Business process* (C) client registration: Activity: Query client record: As a Health worker, I want to: >To enter additional search criteria if there are multiple possible matches so that >My list of matches is shorter and easier to review

*Business process* (C) client registration: Activity: Create client record: As a Health worker, I want to: >The system to enforce a minimal required data set for new registrations so that >Sufficient data is entered to be able to identify the client

*Business process* (C) client registration: Activity: Validate client details: As a Health worker, I want to: >To select the place of birth from a standardized list of locations so that >Entry errors are prevented

*Business process* (C) client registration: Activity: Validate client details: As a Health worker, I want to: >To select the vaccination location of the client from a list of locations so that >Entry errors are prevented

*Business process* (C) client registration: Activity: Create client record: As a Health worker, I want to: >The system to uniquely identify every client using a system generated unique identifier or an existing identifier (e.g. health care, national ID, health unique ID) so that >The client can be definitively identified using that number

*Business process* (C) client registration: Activity: Create client record: As a Health worker, I want to: >The system to generate a unique identifier so that >The client can be uniquely identified for vaccination activities across systems using the same ID
*Business process* (C) client registration: Activity: Create client record: As a Health worker, I want to: >Validate a unique identifier when system is offline so that >Entry errors are prevented

*Business process* (C) client registration: Activity: Validate client details: As a Health worker, I want to: >The ability to generate a barcode label to affix to the paper record so that >The record can easily be uniquely identified by scanning the ID

*Business process* (C) client registration: Activity: Validate client details: As a Health worker, I want to: >The ability to associate a unique ID generated by another authority (local or global) to the record so that >The record can be more easily shared or identified with other appropriate systems

*Business process* (C) client registration: Activity: Validate client details: As a Health worker, I want to: >The system to display the information of the selected record so that >I can validate and update (if needed) client information

*Business process* (C) client registration: Activity: Validate client details: As a Health worker, I want to: >To be able to modify appropriate client data as needed so that >the record contains up to date information

*Business process* (C) client registration: Activity: Validate client details: As a Health worker, I want to: >The system to track that I have changed an existing record so that >accountability for data modification is ensured

*Business process* (C) client registration: Activity: Validate client details: As a Health worker, I want to: >The system to identify changes made to the record for my confirmation before saving so that >I can have the opportunity to double check the data to prevent entry errors

*Business process* (D) administer vaccine: Activity: Capture or update client history: As a Health worker, I want to: >The system to provide a history of previous care (including previous vaccination records) so that >I have access and review client's history

*Business process* (D) administer vaccine: Activity: Capture or update client history: As a Health worker, I want to: >To add client's health history (including previous vaccination records) so that >I can appropriately determine which vaccinations are required

*Business process* (D) administer vaccine: Activity: Determine required vaccination(s): As a Health worker, I want to: >The system to display vaccines due according to predefined vaccine protocol so that >I can assess which vaccines need to be administered

*Business process* (D) administer vaccine: Activity: Determine required vaccination(s): As a Health worker, I want to: >The system to determine vaccines due for a given client by considering relevant information, such as the age of the client, vaccine products, vaccines already given and predefined vaccine protocol so that >it helps me with selecting the appropriate vaccines for the client

*Business process* (D) administer vaccine: Activity: Determine required vaccination(s): As a Health worker, I want to: >The system to ensure I have the most up-to-date vaccine protocols so that >It will recommend the correct schedule

*Business process* (D) administer vaccine: Activity: Determine vaccine(s) to be administered based on contraindications: As a Health worker, I want to: >To be alerted of any relevant potential contraindications for the vaccine (e.g. based on age, previous allergic reactions, etc.) so that >I can withhold the vaccine, if contraindicated

*Business process* (D) administer vaccine: Activity: Determine vaccine(s) to be administered based on contraindications: As a Health worker, I want to: >To be able to quickly access information regarding any contraindications by antigen so that >I can access all information on contraindications in one place

*Business process* (D) administer vaccine: Activity: Check stock availability of recommended vaccines: As a Health worker, I want to: >The system to display stock availability of recommended vaccines so that >I can check if the vaccines are available

*Business process* (D) administer vaccine: Activity: Check stock availability of recommended vaccines: As a Health worker, I want to: >The system to warn if required vaccine is not in stock so that >I can alert the client if the vaccine is not available

*Business process* (D) administer vaccine: Activity: Check stock availability of recommended vaccines: As a Health worker, I want to: >The system to display the expiry date of stock to ensure expired vaccines are not administered so that >I give safe and effective doses only

*Business process* (D) administer vaccine: Activity: Dispose of waste: As a Health worker, I want to: >To update stock record so that >I know which stock adjustments have not been done automatically (such as in instances if something is wasted)
*Business process* (D) administer vaccine: Activity: Update client record: As a Health worker, I want to: >To document why a vaccine was not given so that >The client has a complete record

*Business process* (D) administer vaccine: Activity: Update client record: As a Health worker, I want to: >To update clients’ vaccination record with all relevant information (i.e. date, dose, batch number, lot number, vaccine type, vaccine vial monitor status) so that >The client has a complete record, and doses can be traced

*Business process* (D) administer vaccine: Activity: Update client record: As a Health worker, I want to: >The system to associate the context data for each entry (e.g. the vaccination location where the dose was given, the health worker administering it) so that >The client has a complete record and I can investigate if any issues arise

*Business process* (D) administer vaccine: Activity: Update client record: As a Health worker, I want to: >To record additional vaccinations, even those that are not included in the national vaccination schedule so that >The client has a complete record

*Business process* (D) administer vaccine: Activity: Update client record: As a Health worker, I want to: >The system to log updates of client information so that >Users are accountable for the data they modify

*Business process* (D) administer vaccine: Activity: Update client record: As a Health worker, I want to: >The system to request confirmation if data is modified so that >Accidental or erroneous changes will not be saved

*Business process* (D) administer vaccine: Activity: Monitor the client for any adverse reactions: As a Health worker, I want to: >To record any significant observations (such as reaction) that may be specific to that client so that >I can treat as appropriate

*Business process* (D) administer vaccine: Activity: Determine time for next visit (as needed): As a Health worker, I want to: >The system to display due date of the next vaccine so that >I can inform the client when to return for their next vaccination

*Business process* (D) administer vaccine: Activity: Provide vaccination record: As a Health worker, I want to: >To be prompted for any data required to produce a digital vaccine certificate so that >The record will have all relevant data to produce a certificate

*Business process* (D) administer vaccine: Activity: Does client require a verifiable digital certificate?: As a Health worker, I want to: >To be prompted to ask client if they want a digital vaccination certificate where appropriate so that >The digital vaccination certificate can be generated

*Business process* (D) administer vaccine: Activity: Generate verifiable digital certificate: As a Health worker, I want to: >The system to apply an authorised digital signature when necessary and appropriate so that >The identity of the issuing authority can be validated

*Business process* (E) client reminder: Activity: Define/evaluate criteria: As a Health worker, I want to: >To select reminder parameters. May include but not limited to, age range, vaccine type(s), vaccine schedules, geographic area, number of days overdue, number of reminders, etc. so that >Reminders can be optimized

*Business process* (E) client reminder: Activity: Define/evaluate criteria: As a Health worker, I want to: >To associate a client with a vaccination location to generate a provider-based reminder/recall so that >Vaccination location specific lists of clients can be generated

*Business process* (E) client reminder: Activity: Define/evaluate criteria: As a Health worker, I want to: >To validate data against the vaccine schedule (Note: Can use the vaccine schedule to best schedule reminders/recall for series vaccinations) so that >The generated list adheres to guidelines

*Business process* (E) client reminder: Activity: Select notification method: As a Health worker, I want to: >To select one or more notification methods (e.g. automated telephone calls [i.e. robocall], text message, letter, email, community health worker notification, home visits) so that >The most appropriate notification method will be used

*Business process* (E) client reminder: Activity: Select notification method: As a Health worker, I want to: >To set client's preferred contact method so that >Any notification will go through the client’s preferred method

*Business process* (E) client reminder: Activity: Generate list of clients: As a Health worker, I want to: >The system to track the number of reminders attempts (i.e. per client and total) so that >I can know if additional action may be required, or when to stop sending reminders

*Business process* (E) client reminder: Activity: Generate list of clients: As a Health worker, I want to: >The system to prevent all records given an inactive or deceased status from being included in the list of clients for reminder/recall so that >Notifications will not be inappropriately sent to clients

*Business process* (E) client reminder: Activity: Generate list of clients: As a Health worker, I want to: >to be able to generate a list of clients according to defined parameters so that >I have a list according to my needs

*Business process* (E) client reminder: Activity: Generate list of clients: As a Health worker, I want to: >To print the list of clients generated according to defined parameters so that >I can use it when I am offline

*Business process* (E) client reminder: Activity: Generate list of clients: As a Health worker, I want to: >The system to log each time a user prints a list of clients so that >Printing needs can be monitored

*Business process* (E) client reminder: Activity: Generate list of clients: As a Health worker, I want to: >The system to display the date the reminder/recall notice was sent to a client so that >I will know when it was sent and can follow-up accordingly

*Business process* (E) client reminder: Activity: Send notifications: As a Health worker, I want to: >The system to automatically send reminder notification to client or designated health worker (i.e. community health worker) based on the configured reminder parameters so that >they will be alerted of an upcoming or overdue appointment

*Business process* (E) client reminder: Activity: Send notifications: As a Health worker, I want to: >The notification to include specific details about upcoming immunization session dates and times or outreach dates and times as appropriate so that >The client will know specifically when and where to go to receive a vaccination

*Business process* (F) defaulter tracing: Activity: Determine if vaccines were missed: As a Health worker, I want to: >The system to flag a client as a defaulter after a configured number of reminders are sent so that >We can identify those who have not come and are overdue, requiring additional intervention

*Business process* (F) defaulter tracing: Activity: Determine if vaccines were missed: As a Health worker, I want to: >To specify thresholds for a client to qualify as requiring follow-up, based on the national immunization guidelines so that >Follow up is only done at the appropriate time

*Business process* (F) defaulter tracing: Activity: Generate list of clients who are due or overdue for vaccination: As a Health worker, I want to: >To produce a list of clients who missed their vaccine for each antigen, along with their location and personal information so that >I can plan follow up activities and contact the clients

*Business process* (F) defaulter tracing: Activity: Generate list of clients who are due or overdue for vaccination: As a Health worker, I want to: >To print a list of clients requiring follow-up so that >I will have an offline version

*Business process* (F) defaulter tracing: Activity: Generate list of clients who are due or overdue for vaccination: As a Health worker, I want to: >To export a list of clients for follow-up so that >Information can be sent to another health worker or system as appropriate

*Business process* (F) defaulter tracing: Activity: Record the necessary information to follow-up: As a Health worker, I want to: >To assign a community health worker to a client so that >I can send client information to the correct community health worker

*Business process* (F) defaulter tracing: Activity: Record the necessary information to follow-up: As a Health worker, I want to: >The system to group the defaulters by location and community health worker so that >I can send to the community health workers the appropriate list

*Business process* (F) defaulter tracing: Activity: Plan for follow-up directly or during outreach: As a Health worker, I want to: >To display a list of clients due for specific planned outreach and immunization sessions, based on area so that >The immunization session or outreach will have a targeted list of clients, allowing for prioritization of tasks and workload

*Business process* (F) defaulter tracing: Activity: Send client information to community health worker: As a Health worker, I want to: >To send list of clients who missed immunization sessions by email or SMS to the community health worker so that >The community health worker will have a digital version

*Business process* (F) defaulter tracing: Activity: Provide feedback: As a Community health worker, I want to: >To record in the system the results of the follow-up so that >The information is available in the system and is available for review

*Business process* (F) defaulter tracing: Activity: Update record to document reason/lost follow-up: As a Health worker, I want to: >To record reason vaccine was missed so that >This information can be used for planning and reporting purposes

*Business process* (F) defaulter tracing: Activity: Update record to document reason/lost follow-up: As a Health worker, I want to: >To update client information such as including change of address (moved permanently or temporarily) so that >To facilitate the client being contacted or being removed from a immunization session’s list

*Business process* (F) defaulter tracing: Activity: Update record to document reason/lost follow-up: As a Health worker, I want to: >To flag when there is a change of address and a new client has been added to another catchment area so that >The client will appear on the correct list for follow up

*Business process* (F) defaulter tracing: Activity: Update record to document reason/lost follow-up: As a Health worker, I want to: >To be able to indicate if a client is inactive, identified as either permanently or temporarily, with a reason (e.g. death, moved, refuses vaccine) so that >No further follow up will be done, and they will not appear as defaulters

*Business process* (F) defaulter tracing: Activity: Update record to document reason/lost follow-up: As a Health worker, I want to: >To be able to set a specific inactivity time frame for temporarily inactive clients (e.g. temporarily lost residence, crop harvest season) so that >I can distinguish between those who may require follow up at a specific time in future versus those which are inactive for a indeterminate period of time

*Business process* (F) defaulter tracing: Activity: Update record to document reason/lost follow-up: As a Health worker, I want to: >To be able to generate a report of clients who are inactive and disaggregate by the reason they are inactive so that >It can be used for reporting and planning

*Business process* (G) resolve duplicate client records: Activity: Flag client records for evaluation: As a EIR staff, I want to: >The system to support a rules-based algorithm to evaluate duplicate records so that >Duplicates can be found by the system using pre-defined rules

*Business process* (G) resolve duplicate client records: Activity: Flag client records for evaluation: As a EIR staff, I want to: >To be able to modify the business rules used for identifying duplicate client records so that >The de-duplication process is optimized

*Business process* (G) resolve duplicate client records: Activity: Flag client records for evaluation: As a EIR staff, I want to: >The system to automatically flag client records as possible duplicates by marking them as pending for review so that >The health worker or EIR staff is informed and aware of pending review

*Business process* (G) resolve duplicate client records: Activity: Produce list of potential duplicate records: As a EIR staff, I want to: >The system to schedule batching of duplicate record process so that >They may be processed and assessed together when user is ready

*Business process* (G) resolve duplicate client records: Activity: Perform manual review: As a EIR staff OR health worker, I want to: >To be able to manually flag duplicate records so that >I can identify potential duplicates myself for resolution

*Business process* (G) resolve duplicate client records: Activity: Perform manual review: As a EIR staff OR health worker, I want to: >To be able to view simultaneously potential duplicate records so that >I can easily compare the records and determine if they are duplicates

*Business process* (G) resolve duplicate client records: Activity: Perform manual review: As a EIR staff OR health worker, I want to: >To be able to access the client records while reviewing the duplicates so that >I can review other fields, such as immunization history, to aid in my decision-making

*Business process* (G) resolve duplicate client records: Activity: Perform manual review: As a EIR staff OR health worker, I want to: >To be able to decide what information to keep from the duplicates so that >I make sure the most appropriate information is kept in the consolidated record

*Business process* (G) resolve duplicate client records: Activity: Merge records: As a EIR staff, I want to: >The system to be able to merge records confirmed to be duplicates so that >Duplicate records can be merged

*Business process* (G) resolve duplicate client records: Activity: Merge records: As a EIR staff, I want to: >The system to support an audit trail when records are merged so that >Accountability can be maintained

*Business process* (G) resolve duplicate client records: Activity: Merge records: As a EIR staff, I want to: >The system to be able to provide history of merged record for a given client so that >I can double check if the merge was done appropriately
*Business process* (G) resolve duplicate client records: Activity: Merge records: As a EIR staff, I want to: >The system to be able to undo a merge so that >I can restore records merged incorrectly

*Business process* (G) resolve duplicate client records: Activity: Mark as "not a duplicate" or "pending": As a EIR staff OR health worker, I want to: >To be able to flag records as \"not a duplicate\" so that >It is not presented as a possible duplicates by the system

*Business process* (G) resolve duplicate client records: Activity: Mark as "not a duplicate" or "pending": As a EIR staff OR health worker, I want to: >To be able to enter comments for records marked as \"not a duplicate\" so that >I can add any additional information to let other users see why it was determined to not be a duplicate

*Business process* (H) resolve duplicate vaccination events: Activity: Identify groups of vaccination events for evaluation: As a EIR staff, I want to: >The system to support a rules-based algorithm to evaluate duplicate events so that >Duplicates can be found by the system using pre-defined rules

*Business process* (H) resolve duplicate vaccination events: Activity: Identify groups of vaccination events for evaluation: As a EIR staff, I want to: >The system to automatically flag event records as possible duplicates by marking them as pending for review so that >The health worker or EIR staff is informed and aware of pending review

*Business process* (H) resolve duplicate vaccination events: Activity: Identify groups of vaccination events for evaluation: As a EIR staff, I want to: >to be able to modify the business rules used for identifying vaccination events duplicates so that >The de-duplication process can be optimized

*Business process* (H) resolve duplicate vaccination events: Activity: Identify groups of vaccination events for evaluation: As a EIR staff, I want to: >The system to prompt the user that a new vaccination event might already exist so that >The user can decide if it is a duplicate and if so not save it

*Business process* (H) resolve duplicate vaccination events: Activity: Identify groups of vaccination events for evaluation: As a EIR staff, I want to: >The system to generate automatically a list of possible duplicated vaccination events so that >The review process is optimized

*Business process* (H) resolve duplicate vaccination events: Activity: Evaluate vaccine event records: As a EIR staff OR health worker, I want to: >To be able to manually initiate duplicates identification process so that >It can be done when the user is available to review

*Business process* (H) resolve duplicate vaccination events: Activity: Evaluate vaccine event records: As a EIR staff OR health worker, I want to: >To be able to manually flag duplicate vaccination events so that >I can report duplicates that the system was not able to identify

*Business process* (H) resolve duplicate vaccination events: Activity: Evaluate vaccine event records: As a EIR staff OR health worker, I want to: >The system to display a specific set of data related to the possible duplicated events (such as vaccine type, manufacturer, administration date, etc.) for manual review so that >I am able to perform the review

*Business process* (H) resolve duplicate vaccination events: Activity: Evaluate vaccine event records: As a EIR staff OR health worker, I want to: >To be able to view simultaneously potential duplicate records so that >I can easily compare the records and to determine if they are duplicates

*Business process* (H) resolve duplicate vaccination events: Activity: Evaluate vaccine event records: As a EIR staff OR health worker, I want to: >To be able to access the vaccination events while reviewing the duplicates so that >I can review other fields to aid in my decision-making

*Business process* (H) resolve duplicate vaccination events: Activity: Select the most accurate/suitable event record: As a EIR staff OR health worker, I want to: >The system to automatically select the most accurate/suitable vaccination event to be used as the (primary or master) record so that >the manual review process is optimized

*Business process* (H) resolve duplicate vaccination events: Activity: Select the most accurate/suitable event record: As a EIR staff OR health worker, I want to: >To be able to merge manually duplicate records and decide what information to keep from the duplicates into a consolidated event record so that >I make sure the most accurate consolidated record is kept

*Business process* (H) resolve duplicate vaccination events: Activity: Update vaccination event records: As a EIR staff, I want to: >The system to support an audit trail when event records are merged so that >Accountability can be maintained

*Business process* (H) resolve duplicate vaccination events: Activity: Update vaccination event records: As a EIR staff, I want to: >The system to be able to provide history of merged event records so that >I can double check if the merge was done appropriately

*Business process* (H) resolve duplicate vaccination events: Activity: Generate report of duplicate vaccine events: As a EIR staff, I want to: >The system to be able to generate a report of duplicate vaccine events including the resolutions so that >I can have a summary of the changes made

*Business process* (I) report generation: Activity: Define parameters for report: As a Health worker, I want to: >To be able to configure report parameters when creating new reports (period of time, inactive versus active clients, client's age, vaccine type, vaccine manufacturer, etc.) so that >Appropriate reports can be generated

*Business process* (I) report generation: Activity: Define parameters for report: As a Health worker, I want to: >To be able to select report parameters when creating vaccination coverage reports (i.e. by vaccine, by dose, by age, by area, by condition, by vaccine manufacturer, etc) so that >Appropriate vaccination coverage reports can be generated

*Business process* (I) report generation: Activity: Define parameters for report: As a Health worker, I want to: >To be able to customize report parameters for error monitoring reports so that >I can generate reports specific to my needs and the nature of potential programmatic errors I want to monitor

*Business process* (I) report generation: Activity: Define parameters for report: As a Health worker, I want to: >To be able to select what information a report shows (i.e. display options, summary versus detail report, sort options) so that >The report presentation can be customised

*Business process* (I) report generation: Activity: Define parameters for report: As a Health worker, I want to: >To be able to schedule routine reports (specific date/time, daily, weekly, etc.) so that >The reports can be generated automatically and are available at the right time

*Business process* (I) report generation: Activity: Generate report: As a EIR staff, I want to: >The system to produce and export reports in multiple formats (i.e. CSV, PDF) on demand so that >I can select the most appropriate format for my needs
*Business process* (I) report generation: Activity: Generate report: As a EIR staff, I want to: >The system to be able to print reports on demand so that >I can have a paper version of the report
*Business process* (I) report generation: Activity: Generate report: As a EIR staff, I want to: >The system to show me a preview of the report before printing so that >I can review before printing
*Business process* (I) report generation: Activity: Generate report: As a EIR staff, I want to: >The system to log the actions performed on the reports so that >An audit can be performed when needed

*Business process* (I) report generation: Activity: Generate report: As a Health worker, I want to: >The system to offer the posibility of sending the generated report by email so that >I do not have to manually do that
Make efficient use of data communication time
Make efficient use of capabilities of lower-cost mobile devices
Support data capacity considerations (including those for data transmission, storage and processing) for all users over the expected lifetime of the system
Use a database that can scale to support projected transaction volume
Provide real-time response to transactions submitted by connected devices up to the configured national volume level
Provide real-time messages such as "report processing" or "in progress" for transactions that affect the system performance
Use open standards to promote interoperability
Exchange actionable data between systems (need to enforce semantic interoperability)
Provide access from internet-enabled devices
Support flexible models for data collection (e.g. including paper forms, web forms, SMS, barcode, etc.)
Comply with industry standards for data exchange
Operate with open-source or third-party reporting tools
Comply with industry standards for tracking and tracing of supplies
Enable streamlined data collection, organization and dissemination
Provide access to data through application programming interfaces
Link with insurance systems to verify eligibility and submit claims
Allow for data exchange and efficient synchronization across multiple facilities and points of service when the internet is available, even when it is intermittent and slow
Configure the system centrally
Configure business rules in line with guidelines and standard operating procedures
Configure error messages
Enable configuration to any national or subnational administrative structure or number of levels
Allow for flexible configurations based on the context of use, including the physical, regulatory and social environment
Transmit information in a language (script or voice) that is understood by the user population
Emphasize ease of use and learnability to reduce training costs
Be able to be learned easily by end users and supervisors to meet specified goals of system effectiveness and efficiency
Enable easy data collection, organization (predefined drop-down menus or searchable lists, radio buttons, check boxes) and dissemination
Focus on the mobile-user experience with secondary use of a computer
Allow users to find features in two clicks or fewer
Provide a search interface to reduce data-entry burden and improve accuracy on mobile devices
Support real-time data-entry validation and feedback to prevent data-entry errors from being recorded
Support ability to calculate values on behalf of user (eliminating need to add, subtract, multiply or divide)
Provide an appropriate localized experience with both language and cultural translations

Support ability to recalculate the immunization scheduled or provide clinical decision support in the event that the client does not receive vaccines on time or has contraindications to their administration
Be user-friendly for people with low computer literacy
Provide informative error messages and tooltips
Alert the user when navigating away from a form without saving
Use industry-standard user interface practices and apply them consistently throughout the system
Provide guidance to users to better support clinical guidelines and best clinical practices
Be reliable and robust (minimize the number of system crashes)
Adjust display to fit small screens (e.g. mobile phones)
Enable a task to be cancelled and rolled back to previous state
Enable users to work offline and then synchronize data when data connection is available
Allow a task to be interrupted and resumed
Enable earlier versions of a record to be recoverable
Enable backup of data so that information is recoverable in the event of a system or hardware failure
Accommodate loss of connectivity to hosted application (network may become unavailable while a user is in the process of submitting a form)
Be able to reliably perform tasks within appropriate time with resistance to failures or deadlocks
Be deployed in an environment subject to power loss
Allow for client devices with low bandwidth or irregular connectivity
Prevent unauthorized access to clients' protected health information
Prevent updates to the database occurring only partially (atomicity), which can cause greater problems than rejecting an entire submission of a form
Trace and record changes to data taken by the system and by users (update/delete/add/access)
Allow the administrator to establish access privileges and priorities
Support definitions of unlimited roles and assigned levels of access, viewing, entry, editing and auditing
Require each user to authenticate by role before gaining access to the system
Provide flexible password control to align to national policy and standard operating procedures, including password format requirements
Protect system servers through the use of an internet firewall
Comply with country's existing health information storage policies
Protect against viruses and malware
Allow for maintenance of security updates
Have a source code audit against security threats
Log all activities performed by the user, including date and time stamp
Maintain a transaction log history (system logins and logouts)
Support privacy policies such as identifying who has access to the health data, and what data can be accessed
Design software security protections to ensure system availability
Provide a means to ensure confidentiality and privacy of personal health information
Provide the ability for allowed users to view confidential data
Anonymize data that are exported from the system
Prevent remembering username and password
Automatically log out the user after a specified time of inactivity
Provide encrypted communication between components
Provide secure data transmission methods to prevent others from seeing data sent from one computer to another by using data encryption and private networks across public networks
Notify the user to change their password the first time they log in
Provide a mechanism to securely change a user's password
Notify the user of a password change to their account
Reset a user's password in a secure manner
Lock a user out after a specified number of wrong password attempts
Notify a user if their account is locked due to wrong password attempts
Record all authentication violations
Log access to views of individual client records
Log access to data summaries, reports, analysis and visualization features
Log exchange of data with other systems
Generate analysis of the use of different system features and reports
Log all data and system errors
Allow user with permission to create a new user and temporary password
Allow roles to be associated with specific geographical areas or health-care facilities
Allow cascading user management and assignment of roles
Allow user to change their own password
Allow admin user to request password reset
Notify the user to regularly change their password
Allow each user to be assigned to one or more roles
Be built using technologies that enable local control, open competition and transparency of the code
Have adequate support resources to ensure reusability, scalability and sustainability
Support reusability of the system source code
Promote easier acquisition by supporting a range of devices and form factors
Able to access the system at all levels/stores
Enable local control of operations
Be well-documented, including known issues
Support repair or upgrade of a component in a running system
Provide a unique version number for each version (all future updates and releases)
Enable the system to detect incompatible versions of software running on different components
Have a support process that tracks and documents bugs from discovery to resolution
Enable access to the central system from all levels of the health system
Support changes to organizational alignment of facilities and personnel
Include an administrable content management system
Provide detailed architectural, operational and testing documentation
Be able to provide continuity and access to data throughout changes in infrastructure (e.g. telecommunication, power) at the health-post level
Support extensibility and/or the ability to accept new services or functionality
Generate IDs that are unique across different locations or sites
Report version number when saving data to the database
Show the number of records that are not yet synchronized
Have the ability to easily back up information
Warn user if no valid back-up for more than a predefined number of days
Support the ability to store images and other unstructured data
Scalable to accommodate new demands
Be able to accommodate at least [x number of] health-care facilities
Be able to accommodate at least [x number of] concurrent users

name.value: Query client record

description.value: *Business process* (C) client registration: Activity: Query client record: As a Health worker, I want to: >To search for a client using at least two identifying information so that >I improve my chances of finding a match and distinguishing between similar records

name.value: Query client record

description.value: *Business process* (C) client registration: Activity: Query client record: As a Health worker, I want to: >To search for the client record given some demographic information so that >I can find the client record if I do not have the unique ID

name.value: Query client record

description.value: *Business process* (C) client registration: Activity: Query client record: As a Health worker, I want to: >The system to return all potential matches based upon search criteria so that >I can find the best match

name.value: Query client record

description.value: *Business process* (C) client registration: Activity: Query client record: As a Health worker, I want to: >The search to match on partial information (such as partial birthdates) so that >I have a better chance of finding a match

name.value: Query client record

description.value: *Business process* (C) client registration: Activity: Query client record: As a Health worker, I want to: >The system to allow search parameters configuration: mandatory fields, when partial information is acceptable, etc. so that >A search can be optimized without compromising confidentiality

name.value: Query client record

description.value: *Business process* (C) client registration: Activity: Query client record: As a Health worker, I want to: >To search with wild cards (using a symbol to replace one or more characters) so that >I can find something without knowing the exact spelling

name.value: Query client record

description.value: *Business process* (C) client registration: Activity: Query client record: As a Health worker, I want to: >To find client records using barcodes that contain the client ID so that >I can quickly pull up the correct record

name.value: Query client record

description.value: *Business process* (C) client registration: Activity: Query client record: As a Health worker, I want to: >The ability for searches to include results that look or sound similar to the search term (phonetic search) so that >I can find something that may be spelt incorrectly

name.value: Query client record

description.value: *Business process* (C) client registration: Activity: Query client record: As a Health worker, I want to: >the system to identify any records that may have been imported from another system so that >I can verify the quality of imported data

name.value: Query client record

description.value: *Business process* (C) client registration: Activity: Query client record: As a Health worker, I want to: >The system to prompt a search for the client (check if it is already in the system) prior to starting a new record so that >Duplicates are prevented

name.value: Query client record

description.value: *Business process* (C) client registration: Activity: Query client record: As a Health worker, I want to: >The system to retrieve and display, as a search result, a specific set of data (demographic information/photo/unique ID, etc. ) so that >I can select the correct record

name.value: Query client record

description.value: *Business process* (C) client registration: Activity: Query client record: As a Health worker, I want to: >The system to display the most probable matches at the top of the list so that >I can review them first

name.value: Query client record

description.value: *Business process* (C) client registration: Activity: Query client record: As a Health worker, I want to: >To be able to extend the search to external systems (such as a birth registry or a scheduling system) so that >Duplicates of client record are prevented

name.value: Query client record

description.value: *Business process* (C) client registration: Activity: Query client record: As a Health worker, I want to: >To enter additional search criteria if there are multiple possible matches so that >My list of matches is shorter and easier to review
