name.value: Record details on planning sheet

description.value: *Business process* (B) plan service delivery: Activity: Record details on planning sheet: As a Health worker, I want to: >To print the list of necessary antigens and accessories (e.g. syringes, wipes) based on projected need so that >I can make sure I have an offline list of all the things I need for my immunization session

name.value: Record details on planning sheet

description.value: *Business process* (B) plan service delivery: Activity: Record details on planning sheet: As a Health worker, I want to: >To be able to check in the system the available stock at my vaccination location or at the local storage area/warehouse so that >I can determine the stock available for use

name.value: Record details on planning sheet

description.value: *Business process* (B) plan service delivery: Activity: Record details on planning sheet: As a Health worker, I want to: >The system to compare the list of needed antigens to the stock on hand and indicate if there is sufficient stock so that >I do not have to make these calculations myself

name.value: Record stock taken

description.value: *Business process* (B) plan service delivery: Activity: Record stock taken: As a Health worker, I want to: >The system to allow barcode reading of stock taken so that >the system can be automatically and accurately updated

name.value: Record stock taken

description.value: *Business process* (B) plan service delivery: Activity: Record stock taken: As a Health worker, I want to: >To record stock removed from cold storage and taken to immunization session so that >The count for the cold storage will be accurate, and the immunization session stock will be accounted for

name.value: Record stock taken

description.value: *Business process* (B) plan service delivery: Activity: Record stock taken: As a Health worker, I want to: >The system to maintain a tally of stock available at each location (e.g. stock available in the cold fridge at vaccination location, stock that is out for immunization session) so that >I can see where all stock is physically located in real time

name.value: Record the necessary information to follow-up

description.value: *Business process* (F) defaulter tracing: Activity: Record the necessary information to follow-up: As a Health worker, I want to: >To assign a community health worker to a client so that >I can send client information to the correct community health worker

name.value: Record the necessary information to follow-up

description.value: *Business process* (F) defaulter tracing: Activity: Record the necessary information to follow-up: As a Health worker, I want to: >The system to group the defaulters by location and community health worker so that >I can send to the community health workers the appropriate list

name.value: Review past vaccination records to estimate vaccines needed

description.value: *Business process* (B) plan service delivery: Activity: Review past vaccination records to estimate vaccines needed: As a Health worker, I want to: >To sort the list of needed vaccines by antigen so that >I know how much of each vaccine is needed

name.value: Review past vaccination records to estimate vaccines needed

description.value: *Business process* (B) plan service delivery: Activity: Review past vaccination records to estimate vaccines needed: As a Health worker, I want to: >The system to provide range estimates for needed vaccines based on historical data (high and low ranges) so that >I can know how much vaccine has typically been used and adjust my specific list accordingly

description.value: *Business process* (E) client reminder: Activity: Select notification method: As a Health worker, I want to: >To select one or more notification methods (e.g. automated telephone calls [i.e. robocall], text message, letter, email, community health worker notification, home visits) so that >The most appropriate notification method will be used

name.value: Select notification method

description.value: *Business process* (E) client reminder: Activity: Select notification method: As a Health worker, I want to: >To set client's preferred contact method so that >Any notification will go through the client’s preferred method

name.value: Send notifications

name.value: Support definitions of unlimited roles and assigned levels of access, viewing, entry, editing and auditing

description.value: *Category*: Confidentiality, privacy and security Support definitions of unlimited roles and assigned levels of access, viewing, entry, editing and auditing

name.value: Support extensibility and/or the ability to accept new services or functionality

description.value: *Category*: Portability Support extensibility and/or the ability to accept new services or functionality

name.value: Support flexible models for data collection (e.g. including paper forms, web forms, SMS, barcode, etc.)

description.value: *Category*: Compatibility Support flexible models for data collection (e.g. including paper forms, web forms, SMS, barcode, etc.)

name.value: Support privacy policies such as identifying who has access to the health data, and what data can be accessed

description.value: *Category*: Confidentiality, privacy and security Support privacy policies such as identifying who has access to the health data, and what data can be accessed

name.value: Support real-time data-entry validation and feedback to prevent data-entry errors from being recorded

description.value: *Category*: Usability Support real-time data-entry validation and feedback to prevent data-entry errors from being recorded

name.value: Support repair or upgrade of a component in a running system

description.value: *Category*: Maintainability Support repair or upgrade of a component in a running system

name.value: Support reusability of the system source code

description.value: *Category*: Maintainability Support reusability of the system source code

name.value: Support the ability to store images and other unstructured data

description.value: *Category*: General Support the ability to store images and other unstructured data

name.value: The ability for searches to include results that look or sound similar to the search term (phonetic search)

description.value: As a Health worker, I want: >The ability for searches to include results that look or sound similar to the search term (phonetic search) so that >I can find something that may be spelt incorrectly

name.value: The ability to associate a unique ID generated by another authority (local or global) to the record

description.value: As a Health worker, I want: >The ability to associate a unique ID generated by another authority (local or global) to the record so that >The record can be more easily shared or identified with other appropriate systems

name.value: The ability to generate a barcode label to affix to the paper record

description.value: As a Health worker, I want: >The ability to generate a barcode label to affix to the paper record so that >The record can easily be uniquely identified by scanning the ID

name.value: The EIR system to be able to communicate with other systems (such as a national health management information system [HMIS] and Expanded Programme on Immunization [EPI]) to obtain vaccination locations information and other necessary information

description.value: As a Electronic immunization registry (EIR) staff, I want: >The EIR system to be able to communicate with other systems (such as a national health management information system [HMIS] and Expanded Programme on Immunization [EPI]) to obtain vaccination locations information and other necessary information so that >I will know about new vaccination locations and be informed about any updated information

name.value: The notification to include specific details about upcoming immunization session dates and times or outreach dates and times as appropriate

description.value: As a Health worker, I want: >The notification to include specific details about upcoming immunization session dates and times or outreach dates and times as appropriate so that >The client will know specifically when and where to go to receive a vaccination

name.value: The search to match on partial information (such as partial birthdates)

description.value: As a Health worker, I want: >The search to match on partial information (such as partial birthdates) so that >I have a better chance of finding a match

name.value: The system to allow barcode reading of stock taken

description.value: As a Health worker, I want: >The system to allow barcode reading of stock taken so that >the system can be automatically and accurately updated

name.value: The system to allow conversion of a temporary vaccination location to a permanent vaccination location

description.value: As a EIR staff, I want: >The system to allow conversion of a temporary vaccination location to a permanent vaccination location so that >The data from the temporary vaccination location is not lost

name.value: The system to allow manual insertion of a new vaccination location not present in the NMFL in the EIR master list

description.value: As a EIR staff, I want: >The system to allow manual insertion of a new vaccination location not present in the NMFL in the EIR master list so that >I can add and use vaccination locations that are not yet in NMFL or other interconnected systems

name.value: The system to allow me to print the stock order(s) to be fulfilled

description.value: As a Health worker, I want: >The system to allow me to print the stock order(s) to be fulfilled so that >I can use this as my pick up list, even when I am offline

name.value: The system to allow search parameters configuration: mandatory fields, when partial information is acceptable, etc.

description.value: As a Health worker, I want: >The system to allow search parameters configuration: mandatory fields, when partial information is acceptable, etc. so that >A search can be optimized without compromising confidentiality

name.value: The system to apply an authorised digital signature when necessary and appropriate

description.value: As a Health worker, I want: >The system to apply an authorised digital signature when necessary and appropriate so that >The identity of the issuing authority can be validated

name.value: The system to associate the context data for each entry (e.g. the vaccination location where the dose was given, the health worker administering it)

description.value: As a Health worker, I want: >The system to associate the context data for each entry (e.g. the vaccination location where the dose was given, the health worker administering it) so that >The client has a complete record and I can investigate if any issues arise

name.value: The system to automatically flag client records as possible duplicates by marking them as pending for review

description.value: As a EIR staff, I want: >The system to automatically flag client records as possible duplicates by marking them as pending for review so that >The health worker or EIR staff is informed and aware of pending review

name.value: The system to automatically flag event records as possible duplicates by marking them as pending for review

description.value: As a EIR staff, I want: >The system to automatically flag event records as possible duplicates by marking them as pending for review so that >The health worker or EIR staff is informed and aware of pending review

name.value: The system to automatically identify changes in vaccination locations information, retrieved from other interconnected systems, and prompt for validation

description.value: As a EIR staff, I want: >The system to automatically identify changes in vaccination locations information, retrieved from other interconnected systems, and prompt for validation so that >I will know what changes are being made and can validate them

name.value: The system to automatically select the most accurate/suitable vaccination event to be used as the (primary or master) record

description.value: As a EIR staff OR health worker, I want: >The system to automatically select the most accurate/suitable vaccination event to be used as the (primary or master) record so that >the manual review process is optimized

name.value: The system to automatically send reminder notification to client or designated health worker (i.e. community health worker) based on the configured reminder parameters

description.value: As a Health worker, I want: >The system to automatically send reminder notification to client or designated health worker (i.e. community health worker) based on the configured reminder parameters so that >they will be alerted of an upcoming or overdue appointment

name.value: The system to be able to generate a report of duplicate vaccine events including the resolutions

description.value: As a EIR staff, I want: >The system to be able to generate a report of duplicate vaccine events including the resolutions so that >I can have a summary of the changes made

name.value: The system to be able to link a vaccination location’s NMFL identification (ID) with the corresponding EIR identifier

description.value: As a EIR staff, I want: >The system to be able to link a vaccination location’s NMFL identification (ID) with the corresponding EIR identifier so that >There will be a common understanding of what vaccination location is being referenced

name.value: The system to be able to merge records confirmed to be duplicates

description.value: As a EIR staff, I want: >The system to be able to merge records confirmed to be duplicates so that >Duplicate records can be merged

name.value: The system to be able to print reports on demand

description.value: As a EIR staff, I want: >The system to be able to print reports on demand so that >I can have a paper version of the report

name.value: The system to be able to provide history of merged event records

description.value: As a EIR staff, I want: >The system to be able to provide history of merged event records so that >I can double check if the merge was done appropriately

name.value: The system to be able to provide history of merged record for a given client

description.value: As a EIR staff, I want: >The system to be able to provide history of merged record for a given client so that >I can double check if the merge was done appropriately

name.value: The system to be able to undo a merge

description.value: As a EIR staff, I want: >The system to be able to undo a merge so that >I can restore records merged incorrectly

name.value: The system to be able to update vaccination location information

description.value: As a EIR staff, I want: >The system to be able to update vaccination location information so that >We have a complete vaccination location record

name.value: The system to compare the list of needed antigens to the stock on hand and indicate if there is sufficient stock

description.value: As a Health worker, I want: >The system to compare the list of needed antigens to the stock on hand and indicate if there is sufficient stock so that >I do not have to make these calculations myself

name.value: The system to determine vaccines due for a given client by considering relevant information, such as the age of the client, vaccine products, vaccines already given and predefined vaccine protocol

description.value: As a Health worker, I want: >The system to determine vaccines due for a given client by considering relevant information, such as the age of the client, vaccine products, vaccines already given and predefined vaccine protocol so that >it helps me with selecting the appropriate vaccines for the client

name.value: The system to display a specific set of data related to the possible duplicated events (such as vaccine type, manufacturer, administration date, etc.) for manual review

description.value: As a EIR staff OR health worker, I want: >The system to display a specific set of data related to the possible duplicated events (such as vaccine type, manufacturer, administration date, etc.) for manual review so that >I am able to perform the review

name.value: The system to display due date of the next vaccine

description.value: As a Health worker, I want: >The system to display due date of the next vaccine so that >I can inform the client when to return for their next vaccination

name.value: The system to display stock availability of recommended vaccines

description.value: As a Health worker, I want: >The system to display stock availability of recommended vaccines so that >I can check if the vaccines are available

name.value: The system to display the date the reminder/recall notice was sent to a client

description.value: As a Health worker, I want: >The system to display the date the reminder/recall notice was sent to a client so that >I will know when it was sent and can follow-up accordingly

name.value: The system to display the expiry date of stock to ensure expired vaccines are not administered

description.value: As a Health worker, I want: >The system to display the expiry date of stock to ensure expired vaccines are not administered so that >I give safe and effective doses only

name.value: The system to display the information of the selected record

description.value: As a Health worker, I want: >The system to display the information of the selected record so that >I can validate and update (if needed) client information

name.value: The system to display the most probable matches at the top of the list

description.value: As a Health worker, I want: >The system to display the most probable matches at the top of the list so that >I can review them first

name.value: The system to display vaccines due according to predefined vaccine protocol

description.value: As a Health worker, I want: >The system to display vaccines due according to predefined vaccine protocol so that >I can assess which vaccines need to be administered

name.value: The system to enforce a minimal required data set for new registrations

description.value: As a Health worker, I want: >The system to enforce a minimal required data set for new registrations so that >Sufficient data is entered to be able to identify the client

name.value: The system to ensure I have the most up-to-date vaccine protocols

description.value: As a Health worker, I want: >The system to ensure I have the most up-to-date vaccine protocols so that >It will recommend the correct schedule

name.value: The system to flag a client as a defaulter after a configured number of reminders are sent

name.value: The system to flag any vaccination location registered in the EIR that is not on the NMFL

description.value: As a EIR staff, I want: >The system to flag any vaccination location registered in the EIR that is not on the NMFL so that >I can identify vaccination locations that need further investigation

name.value: The system to generate a unique EIR identifier which may be linked to national ID or health ID

description.value: As a EIR staff, I want: >The system to generate a unique EIR identifier which may be linked to national ID or health ID so that >The vaccination location will have an unique identifier in the EIR system

name.value: The system to generate a unique identifier

description.value: As a Health worker, I want: >The system to generate a unique identifier so that >The client can be uniquely identified for vaccination activities across systems using the same ID

name.value: The system to generate automatically a list of possible duplicated vaccination events

description.value: As a EIR staff, I want: >The system to generate automatically a list of possible duplicated vaccination events so that >The review process is optimized

name.value: The system to generate report of missing information

description.value: As a EIR staff, I want: >The system to generate report of missing information so that >Missing information can be obtained

description.value: As a Health worker, I want: >The system to group the defaulters by location and community health worker so that >I can send to the community health workers the appropriate list

name.value: the system to identify any records that may have been imported from another system

description.value: As a Health worker, I want: >the system to identify any records that may have been imported from another system so that >I can verify the quality of imported data

name.value: The system to identify changes made to the record for my confirmation before saving

description.value: As a Health worker, I want: >The system to identify changes made to the record for my confirmation before saving so that >I can have the opportunity to double check the data to prevent entry errors

description.value: As a EIR staff, I want: >The system to include instructions on how to use EIR identifier so that >Other systems will know how to interact with the EIR

description.value: As a EIR staff, I want: >The system to interface with National Master Facility List (NMFL) database to validate the EIR master list of vaccination locations so that >I can ensure the lists are synchronized

name.value: The system to log each time a user prints a list of clients

description.value: As a Health worker, I want: >The system to log each time a user prints a list of clients so that >Printing needs can be monitored

description.value: As a EIR staff, I want: >The system to log the actions performed on the reports so that >An audit can be performed when needed

description.value: As a Health worker, I want: >The system to offer the posibility of sending the generated report by email so that >I do not have to manually do that

description.value: As a Health worker, I want: >To be prompted for any data required to produce a digital vaccine certificate so that >The record will have all relevant data to produce a certificate

name.value: To be prompted to ask client if they want a digital vaccination certificate where appropriate

description.value: As a Health worker, I want: >To be prompted to ask client if they want a digital vaccination certificate where appropriate so that >The digital vaccination certificate can be generated

name.value: To display a list of clients due for specific planned outreach and immunization sessions, based on area

description.value: As a Health worker, I want: >To display a list of clients due for specific planned outreach and immunization sessions, based on area so that >The immunization session or outreach will have a targeted list of clients, allowing for prioritization of tasks and workload

name.value: To document why a vaccine was not given

description.value: As a Health worker, I want: >To document why a vaccine was not given so that >The client has a complete record

name.value: To enter additional search criteria if there are multiple possible matches

description.value: As a Health worker, I want: >To enter additional search criteria if there are multiple possible matches so that >My list of matches is shorter and easier to review

name.value: To export a list of clients for follow-up

description.value: As a Health worker, I want: >To export a list of clients for follow-up so that >Information can be sent to another health worker or system as appropriate

name.value: To find client records using barcodes that contain the client ID

description.value: As a Health worker, I want: >To find client records using barcodes that contain the client ID so that >I can quickly pull up the correct record

name.value: To flag when there is a change of address and a new client has been added to another catchment area

description.value: As a Health worker, I want: >To flag when there is a change of address and a new client has been added to another catchment area so that >The client will appear on the correct list for follow up

name.value: To identify, by checking the information in the system, all clients that are due (or overdue) for vaccination by the next immunization session date

description.value: As a Health worker, I want: >To identify, by checking the information in the system, all clients that are due (or overdue) for vaccination by the next immunization session date so that >I can plan my immunization session

name.value: To print a list of clients requiring follow-up

description.value: As a Health worker, I want: >To print a list of clients requiring follow-up so that >I will have an offline version

name.value: To print the list of clients generated according to defined parameters

description.value: As a Health worker, I want: >To print the list of clients generated according to defined parameters so that >I can use it when I am offline

name.value: To print the list of necessary antigens and accessories (e.g. syringes, wipes) based on projected need

description.value: As a Health worker, I want: >To print the list of necessary antigens and accessories (e.g. syringes, wipes) based on projected need so that >I can make sure I have an offline list of all the things I need for my immunization session

name.value: To produce a list of clients who missed their vaccine for each antigen, along with their location and personal information

description.value: As a Health worker, I want: >To produce a list of clients who missed their vaccine for each antigen, along with their location and personal information so that >I can plan follow up activities and contact the clients

name.value: To record additional vaccinations, even those that are not included in the national vaccination schedule

description.value: As a Health worker, I want: >To record additional vaccinations, even those that are not included in the national vaccination schedule so that >The client has a complete record

name.value: To record any significant observations (such as reaction) that may be specific to that client

description.value: As a Health worker, I want: >To record any significant observations (such as reaction) that may be specific to that client so that >I can treat as appropriate

name.value: To record in the system the results of the follow-up

description.value: As a Community health worker, I want: >To record in the system the results of the follow-up so that >The information is available in the system and is available for review

name.value: To record reason vaccine was missed

description.value: As a Health worker, I want: >To record reason vaccine was missed so that >This information can be used for planning and reporting purposes

name.value: To record stock removed from cold storage and taken to immunization session

description.value: As a Health worker, I want: >To record stock removed from cold storage and taken to immunization session so that >The count for the cold storage will be accurate, and the immunization session stock will be accounted for

name.value: To search for a client using at least two identifying information

description.value: As a Health worker, I want: >To search for a client using at least two identifying information so that >I improve my chances of finding a match and distinguishing between similar records

name.value: To search for the client record given some demographic information

description.value: As a Health worker, I want: >To search for the client record given some demographic information so that >I can find the client record if I do not have the unique ID

name.value: To search with wild cards (using a symbol to replace one or more characters)

description.value: As a Health worker, I want: >To search with wild cards (using a symbol to replace one or more characters) so that >I can find something without knowing the exact spelling

name.value: To select one or more notification methods (e.g. automated telephone calls [i.e. robocall], text message, letter, email, community health worker notification, home visits)

description.value: As a Health worker, I want: >To select one or more notification methods (e.g. automated telephone calls [i.e. robocall], text message, letter, email, community health worker notification, home visits) so that >The most appropriate notification method will be used

name.value: To select reminder parameters. May include but not limited to, age range, vaccine type(s), vaccine schedules, geographic area, number of days overdue, number of reminders, etc.

description.value: As a Health worker, I want: >To select reminder parameters. May include but not limited to, age range, vaccine type(s), vaccine schedules, geographic area, number of days overdue, number of reminders, etc. so that >Reminders can be optimized

name.value: To select the place of birth from a standardized list of locations

description.value: As a Health worker, I want: >To select the place of birth from a standardized list of locations so that >Entry errors are prevented

name.value: To select the vaccination location of the client from a list of locations

description.value: As a Health worker, I want: >To select the vaccination location of the client from a list of locations so that >Entry errors are prevented

name.value: To send list of clients who missed immunization sessions by email or SMS to the community health worker

description.value: As a Health worker, I want: >To send list of clients who missed immunization sessions by email or SMS to the community health worker so that >The community health worker will have a digital version

name.value: To set client's preferred contact method

description.value: As a Health worker, I want: >To set client's preferred contact method so that >Any notification will go through the client’s preferred method

name.value: To sort the list of needed vaccines by antigen

description.value: As a Health worker, I want: >To sort the list of needed vaccines by antigen so that >I know how much of each vaccine is needed

name.value: To specify thresholds for a client to qualify as requiring follow-up, based on the national immunization guidelines

description.value: As a Health worker, I want: >To specify thresholds for a client to qualify as requiring follow-up, based on the national immunization guidelines so that >Follow up is only done at the appropriate time

name.value: To update client information such as including change of address (moved permanently or temporarily)

description.value: As a Health worker, I want: >To update client information such as including change of address (moved permanently or temporarily) so that >To facilitate the client being contacted or being removed from a immunization session’s list

name.value: To update clients’ vaccination record with all relevant information (i.e. date, dose, batch number, lot number, vaccine type, vaccine vial monitor status)

description.value: As a Health worker, I want: >To update clients’ vaccination record with all relevant information (i.e. date, dose, batch number, lot number, vaccine type, vaccine vial monitor status) so that >The client has a complete record, and doses can be traced

name.value: To update stock record

description.value: As a Health worker, I want: >To update stock record so that >I know which stock adjustments have not been done automatically (such as in instances if something is wasted)

name.value: To validate data against the vaccine schedule (Note: Can use the vaccine schedule to best schedule reminders/recall for series vaccinations)

description.value: As a Health worker, I want: >To validate data against the vaccine schedule (Note: Can use the vaccine schedule to best schedule reminders/recall for series vaccinations) so that >The generated list adheres to guidelines

name.value: Trace and record changes to data taken by the system and by users (update/delete/add/access)

description.value: *Category*: Confidentiality, privacy and security Trace and record changes to data taken by the system and by users (update/delete/add/access)

name.value: Transmit information in a language (script or voice) that is understood by the user population

description.value: *Category*: Usability Transmit information in a language (script or voice) that is understood by the user population

name.value: Update record to document reason/lost follow-up

description.value: *Business process* (F) defaulter tracing: Activity: Update record to document reason/lost follow-up: As a Health worker, I want to: >To flag when there is a change of address and a new client has been added to another catchment area so that >The client will appear on the correct list for follow up

name.value: Update record to document reason/lost follow-up

description.value: *Business process* (F) defaulter tracing: Activity: Update record to document reason/lost follow-up: As a Health worker, I want to: >To be able to indicate if a client is inactive, identified as either permanently or temporarily, with a reason (e.g. death, moved, refuses vaccine) so that >No further follow up will be done, and they will not appear as defaulters

name.value: Update record to document reason/lost follow-up

description.value: *Business process* (F) defaulter tracing: Activity: Update record to document reason/lost follow-up: As a Health worker, I want to: >To be able to set a specific inactivity time frame for temporarily inactive clients (e.g. temporarily lost residence, crop harvest season) so that >I can distinguish between those who may require follow up at a specific time in future versus those which are inactive for a indeterminate period of time

name.value: Update record to document reason/lost follow-up

description.value: *Business process* (F) defaulter tracing: Activity: Update record to document reason/lost follow-up: As a Health worker, I want to: >To be able to generate a report of clients who are inactive and disaggregate by the reason they are inactive so that >It can be used for reporting and planning

name.value: Update vaccination event records

description.value: *Business process* (H) resolve duplicate vaccination events: Activity: Update vaccination event records: As a EIR staff, I want to: >The system to support an audit trail when event records are merged so that >Accountability can be maintained

name.value: Update vaccination event records

description.value: *Business process* (H) resolve duplicate vaccination events: Activity: Update vaccination event records: As a EIR staff, I want to: >The system to be able to provide history of merged event records so that >I can double check if the merge was done appropriately

name.value: Update/add new vaccination location

description.value: *Business process* (A) vaccination location registration: Activity: Update/add new vaccination location: As a EIR staff, I want to: >The system to allow manual insertion of a new vaccination location not present in the NMFL in the EIR master list so that >I can add and use vaccination locations that are not yet in NMFL or other interconnected systems

name.value: Update/add new vaccination location

name.value: Update/add new vaccination location

name.value: Update/add new vaccination location

description.value: *Business process* (A) vaccination location registration: Activity: Update/add new vaccination location: As a EIR staff, I want to: >The system to allow conversion of a temporary vaccination location to a permanent vaccination location so that >The data from the temporary vaccination location is not lost

name.value: Validate against national master facility list
